job.title: Senior Software Engineer - C / C++ / Python
job.description:
We are a rapidly growing autonomy and robotics technology company that has been in business for over 20 years! We are transforming government and commercial transportation with programs that include self-driving cars and trucks; autonomous shuttles; UAV; UAS; and drones. As we grow our team, we are looking for passionate people who want to build long-term careers with us!
What's In It for You
Competitive Compensation Contingent On Experience
Health, Vision, and Dental Benefits
401k Matching
Parental Leave
Life Insurance
What You Need for this Position
Experience as a Senior Software Engineer
C and / or C++
Python
Ability to obtain government clearance; although clearance is not required for this role
B.S., M.S., or Ph.D. degree in the field of Robotics, Computer Science, or Electrical, Mechanical, or Aerospace Engineering
Sensor processing (LIDAR, image processing, stereo cameras, RADAR) is a plus
Familiarity with Linux or other POSIX operating systems (Ubuntu and NuttX) is a plus
Experience with open-source drone development tools and flight controllers (Pixhawk, PX4, Ardupilot) is a plus
Experience with Robot Operating System (ROS) is a plus
Familiarity with microcontroller programming or NVIDIA Jetson embedded platforms is a plus
Kalman Filtering as applied to GPS/INS or IMUs is a plus
Localization, Mapping, SLAM is a plus
What You Will Be Doing
Development of software algorithms related to guidance, navigation, and control of advanced multirotor aerial vehicles
Software will support autonomous vehicle operations including navigation, path planning, obstacle avoidance, sensor processing, and perception
Indoor and outdoor testing of software running on multirotor aerial vehicles
Complete FAA Part 107 training and certification
Work as part of a multi-disciplinary development team, participating in team meetings, design reviews, brainstorming sessions, and testing events
Document activities, prepare tech reports, present results, and demonstrate system capabilities
Travel for field testing and project meetings may be required
So, if you have the experience above, please apply today or email me directly at edwin.ocampo@cybercoders.com!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Edwin.Ocampo@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : EO1-1632158 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Edwin Ocampo - Recruiting Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
